title: The Worst Press Conference I’ve Ever Seen (Ep 1688)
description:
In this episode, I address the worst press conference I’ve ever seen. Biden did something yesterday that’s entirely unforgivable. 

News Picks:

The media desperately wants a DeSantis - Trump feud. Don’t fall for it.

New data shows what we’ve suspected for a long time, natural immunity is superior.


Doctors are now being targeted for treating COVID patients.

Schumer and Sinema stuff attempts to squash the filibuster.
